title: Meta expands AI reel translations to five Indian languages on Instagram, Facebook
description: Meta has enhanced Instagram and Facebook with AI-powered translations for five Indian languages: Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Marathi. This update allows creators to dub and lip-sync reels, expanding their global reach. Additionally, new Indian fonts are available for text and captions, rolling out on Android.

title: Concerns over AI safety
description: The eSafety Commissioner is sounding the alarm over the use of the generative artificial intelligence system known as Grok on the social media platform X, following concerns that the tool is being used to create sexualised or exploitative images of people. While the volume of reports remains low, officials have noted a worrying shift from [...]
